reviewText: This is FANTASTIC. You get a set of videos on how to airbrush the designs, and templates. The files are NOT encrypted. They played fine and I could open the file to cut the stencils.

Beware!!  All the files on this DVD are encrypted and have the extension ".enc" (example:  VTS_01_1. VOB.enc).  I could not view this DVD on my new Sony DVD player (this was the only DVD I have never been able to view), or with Vista or XP.  I sent an email to the author and did not receive a credible response on how to view this DVD.
